dmca.title: [ABUSE] http://www.zogg.biz/service/ on ip 67.19.123.173]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, November 29, 2004 10:11 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] http://www.zogg.biz/service/ on ip 67.19.123.173]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: dh@idologic.com <dh@idologic.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Sunday, November 28, 2004, 10:17:14 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] http://www.zogg.biz/service/ on ip 67.19.123.173]

===8<==============Original message text===============
Sir or Madam,

   we are hereby notifying you of infringement on our copyright by:
http://www.zogg.biz/service/ (ip: 67.19.123.173) which we believe is
hosted on your network. This site infringes on our copyrighted work found
at http://www.idologic.com/services.html. It also abuses our trademark
"Idologic".
   Idologic Inc is the sole copyright owner of the above indicated
material and no license has been provided to zogg.biz or allinet.net.

Best regards,

Damiaan Habets CTO
Idologic Inc

Idologic Incorporated
Suite 11, 700 Collip Circle
London ON, Canada
N6G 4X8







===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBq0nxvK/XpJs6oyURApw1AJ4ishh4jK8p3ty0J+f0dOqssGEe8wCff1YG
+Cv1zqNhpBeS4imWfKnDzP8=
=aVBK
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
